Articles.Content:
Well, I am suprised this did not exist yet. So I made this to boil the hype and answer questions.

Discuss and speculate about 0.26 here! For free!
I hope info about 0.26 will be revealed soon, it's Tuesday already.

It does exist.

Here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96783-The-next-announced-mod-to-get-into-stock-ksp

And Here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95910-What-would-you-want-in-the-next-update-%280-26%29

And really all of them are a bit early, but I guess Maxmaps started it.

It does exist.

Here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96783-The-next-announced-mod-to-get-into-stock-ksp

And Here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95910-What-would-you-want-in-the-next-update-%280-26%29

And really all of them are a bit early, but I guess Maxmaps started it.

The problem is, these threads are just specific discussions about aspects of 0.26. This thread is for general discussion, and to sum up these threads.

The problem is, these threads are just specific discussions about aspects of 0.26. This thread is for general discussion, and to sum up these threads.

If you want general stuff it can be found here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/3-General-KSP

Why do we need a thread to sum up the forums?

If you want general stuff it can be found here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/3-General-KSP

Why do we need a thread to sum up the forums?

I am tired if arguing, the mods should lock this if necessary. You only bumped the thread.

It's nothing personal, just that these threads don't make sense, even when Squad does it. If they want a dedicated place for discussion of specific patches they should be making sub-forums, not threads.
Of course, then we need a thread about the creation of specific build sub forums, each with it's own thread ....
Definitely useless to open another thread. Use those already open. Closed.
